start_message.english: Welcome to Licensure Support! Here you can leave a request for help with our platform or contact us for other purposes.

stop.english: You stopped the bot, to start it again enter - /start

help.english: Please describe the problem you're experiencing with our platform.

help_thanks.english: Thank you for reporting the problem. We will look into it and get back to you as soon as possible.

question.english: Please ask your question and we will get back to you with an answer.

contact.english: Please provide your contact information or any message you'd like to send to the developer.

contact_thanks.english: Thank you for contacting us. We will get back to you soon.
